name: CbcEventHandler
brief: Event handling and callbacks for Cbc

algorithms.name:
Callback Mechanism for B&C Control
Copyright (C) 2006, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcEventHandler: Callback mechanism for monitoring and controlling B&C.
Provides hooks at key points in the search process.

Events (CbcEvent enum):
- node: After processing a node
- solution: Integer solution found
- heuristicSolution: Solution from heuristic
- treeStatus: Periodic tree status report
- endSearch: Search termination
- afterRootCuts: Root node complete

Actions (CbcAction enum):
- noAction: Continue normally
- stop: Abort search
- restart: Restart from current point
- restartRoot: Restart from scratch
- killSolution: Reject found solution

Usage: Derive subclass, override event() method.
Default implementation uses event/action map (eaMap_).

Design matches ClpEventHandler for Clp compatibility.
